description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base with sample CV documents, sets up a vector database, and performs a query using an agent with automatic filtering based on metadata such as user ID and document type.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database used for storing document embeddings.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base of PDF documents with associated metadata.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with support for filters and response generation.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for testing and returns their file paths.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads documents into the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response based on a query, with optional markdown formatting.
